titles: A faithful rebuke to a false report lately dispersed in a letter to a friend in the country Concerning certain differences in doctrinals, between some dissenting ministers in London.
author: Alsop, Vincent, 1629 or 30-1703.
publisher: printed for John Lawrence, at the angel in the Poultrey,
notes: Final leaf bears errata and advertisement.
A reply to: Williams, Daniel.  Gospel truth stated and vindicated .., and to Lobb, Stephen.  A report of the state of the differences ..
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Williams, Daniel, 1643?-1716. --  Gospel-truth stated and vindicated wherein some of Dr. Crisp's opinions are considered --  Early works to 1800.
Lobb, Stephen, d. 1699. --  Report of the present state of the differences in doctrinals, between some dissenting ministers in London --  Early works to 1800.
Dissenters, Religious --  England --  Early works to 1800.
